list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a machine or vehicle with a part that rocks or moves back and forth, e.g., a jigsaw.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they invented a jigger that pulls nets under the ice
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đã phát minh ra một jigger kéo lưới dưới băng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who dances a jig.
a small fore-and-aft sail set at the stern of a ship.
a measure or small glass of spirits or wine.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a jigger or two of rum
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một hoặc hai hoặc hai rum

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a metal golf club with a narrow face.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: conventional price indexes often jigger the market basket's content
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chỉ số giá thông thường thường mặc đồ lót nội dung của thị trường
